metadata.description: Scheme & Environment tags for simulation pre-processing

effect_types.correlation_boost_trailing_script: Add to correlation when team trailing
effect_types.correlation_boost_leading_script: Add to correlation when team leading
effect_types.correlation_boost_rb1: Add to correlation with team RB1 (unusual WR/RB)

effect_types.correlation_boost_pocket_qb: Add to pocket passer QB correlation
